headline: Lowe’s Bets on Pro Market in Billion-Dollar ADG Acquisition
summary: The home improvement retailer is acquiring Artisan Design Group for $1.33 billion in cash, Lowe’s said Monday.  ADG helps contractors design, deliver, and install interior finishes, such as flooring, cabinets and countertops.  It is currently owned by private-equity firm Sterling Group.
